casebody.data:
COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 315PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 22, 2019 Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Eric M. David, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cooper, Roy A. (III). Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorney at Law, D. Martin Warf, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Berger, Philip E., et al. Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Professor Marin K. Levy.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 21st of February 2019 to Continue Oral Argument of 4 March 2019:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of February 2019."
